data.name: Mind Scanners Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Loose yourself in the beautifully composed Mind Scanners soundtrack by Malte Burup. The soundtrack features nine unique tracks that will take you straight back into the retro-futuristic world of The Structure.

Along with the music, you will receive a selection of digital wallpapers to fully customise your desktop and mobile devices for full immersion!

This soundtrack is available in mp3 + .wav format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
